long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The IAB Europe CMP Validator v2.2 checks web pages for the availability of a TCF registered CMP supporting the latest updates to the TCF introduced in IAB Europe's TCF v2.2.
